subject: AKKA
name: Elem Akkadian I
info: Introduction to cuneiform script. Basics of Old Babylonian morphology and syntax. Written drills, readings from Hammurabi laws, foundation inscriptions, annals, religious and epic literature.prereq: Adv undergrads with instr consent or grads

subject: AKKA
name: Elem Akkadian II
info: Continuation of 5011. Readings include The Gilgamesh Epic, The Descent of Ishtar, Mari Letters, Annals of Sennacherib and Essarhaddon, Sargon II.prereq: 5011

subject: AKKA
name: Readings in AKKA
info: Survey of Akkadian literature, including literary, legal, historiographical, and sacred texts. Topics specified in Class Schedule.prereq: 5011, 5022
